articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00, Sunday, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song and other commanding officers of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 Seen standing on both sides of the statues were flags of the WPK and the DPRK and army colors. The guard of honor of the Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards lined up beside them.
					
					 The chief of the guard of honor made a salute to the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid before them was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 He entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence for him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Confers Military Ranks on KPA Commanding Officers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Confers Military Ranks on KPA Commanding Officers
						
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un on Saturday issued an order on promoting the military ranks of KPA commanding officers.
					 According to the order of the supreme commander, the military rank of colonel general was awarded to Kim Rak Gyom, that of lieutenant general to Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Yong Rae, U Chol, Kang Ri Won, Choe Sin Uk, Ri Kum Hyong, Pak Chun Bong and Rim Kwang Ung and that of major general to Song Hak Chol, Ku Kwang So, Ko Un Bong, Kim Chol Ho, Choe Tu Yong, Jong To Ho, Jang Pyong Hyon, Pak Il, Ju Song Nam, Ri Yong Gon, Ri Wan Sik, Kim Kwang Il, Kim Tok Ho, Kil Ryong Ho, Han Kwang Chol, Kim Jong Bong, Pae Un Chol, Kim Sun Gil, Ju Hang Gon, Kim Jae Yun, Kim Chol Su, Ri Su Il, Jong Ui Son, Pak Song Chan, Kim Si Bok, Ri Ho Yong, Kim Tong Chol, Kim Ui Jun and Hwang Sam Chon.
					
					 In his order Kim Jong Un expressed belief that the commanding officers of the KPA, descendants of President Kim Il Sung, soldiers and disciples of leader Kim Jong Il, would cherish in their hearts the trust and expectation of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people and fulfill their responsibility and duties in the sacred struggle for a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Gennadi Zyuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on Feb. 13.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, 
					
					The Korean people and their friends are greeting the 72nd birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Jong Il, the great son of the Korean people.
					
					 Today your country is confidently advancing along the road indicated by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We are witnessing in reality the DPRK achieve successes in building a socialist society and pursue proactive foreign policy true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This is evidenced by the proposals set forth by the DPRK recently to achieve peace and stability in the world and the region.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will remain loyal to the behests of Kim Jong Il and hit their goals.
					
					 Please accept my regards.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Organizations
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received messages of greeting from organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Union of Korean Central Educational Association in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, Standing Council of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Korean Medical Association in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification,
					
					  Central Standing Council of the Korean Human Rights Federation in Japan and other organizations of Chongryon and its affiliated organizations, Joson Sinbo Company, Korean News Service, Hagu Bookshop, Kumgang-san Opera Troupe, Tonghae Co. Ltd., Korean Goods Sales Company, Kumgang Insurance Company, Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan, Korean Press Hall and other enterprises, local headquarters of Chongryon, Korea University and Korean schools at all levels.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on February 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter praised Kim Jong Il's life as the one of a great thinker, statesman and brilliant commander who performed the great exploits unprecedented in the history of the Korean nation and the history of world politics.
					
					 He regarded it as his lifelong mission to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung generation after generation, glorified the immortal Juche idea and Songun idea founded by Kim Il Sung as the guiding idea in the era of independence and provided the big flower garden of the most solid single-minded unity in the motherland, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 He glorified the DPRK as a power of Songun any formidable enemy dares not provoke while making forced march in the blizzards of winter and sweltering weather in simple jumper till the last moments of his life, and took the road of the warmest love and noble dedication for the country and people. His immortal career and exploits will shine forever along with the eternal history of Juche Korea.
					
					 Everything Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il planned and desired is now being translated into a brilliant reality under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un who is identical to them.
					
					 The officials of the General Association of Koreans in China and all other Koreans in China will devote everything to the patriotic work to further glorify the motherland, in hearty response to the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address, though they live abroad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Sunday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a preeminent thinker and theoretician, outstanding leader and peerless elder statesman who defended and glorified socialist Korea by making total dedication all his life while leading the cause of Juche pioneered on Mt. Paektu along the road of victory with his profound ideology and theory and outstanding leadership.
					
					 He foiled every move of the imperialist and reactionary forces to stifle the DPRK under the uplifted banner of Songun and increased the invincible military capacity and strengthened the great army-people unity, thereby putting the dignity of the country and the nation on the highest level in the nation's history and providing a sure guarantee for successfully carrying forward to completion the cause of Juche.
					
					 He was a tender-hearted teacher who wisely led with his clairvoyant wisdom the Juche-oriented movement of Koreans in Japan and provided their happiness and bright future of the rising generations with fatherly love.
					
					 The struggle to bring about a fresh heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan, true to his behests, has now entered the new, higher stage as it is guided by you, another great man of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 You indicated the path and strategic goal of the movement of the Koreans in Japan which has entered a new phase and clarified tasks and ways for its attainment.
					
					 We will uphold Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun, true to your intention, and further strengthen Chongryon, which was organized and demonstrated victories under the leadership of the great men of Mt. Paektu, as a model organization of the overseas Koreans movement.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
						
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Sunday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career is recorded with his love for the country, nation and people, the letter said.
					
					 He worked heart and soul all his life for national reunification and laid a firm foundation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity, it noted, and continued:
					
					 The publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and the great joy brought by the idea of By Our Nation Itself, shaking three thousand-ri of land, were the precious fruition of his unshakable will for reunification, extraordinary strategy, outstanding leadership and broad magnanimity.
					
					 His great revolutionary career is being given steady continuity by you.
					
					 You, regarding national reunification as most ardent patriotism, set forth scientific proposals for reunification with your rare wisdom and outstanding strategy and powerfully encouraged all the Koreans by showing broad magnanimity and making important decisions, thus arousing them to the implementation of the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 The period in which you have led the party, army and people is just a moment in the history of the nation spanning 5 000 years but the exploits you have performed during this period are so great and eye-opening that prominent politicians can hardly do the same even in several generations.
					
					 The letter reiterated the will to develop the AINDF into the ranks of ardent loyalists who never make any deviation from the orbit of independence set by President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and into a steel-strong death-defying corps which takes the lead in upholding his idea of national reunification.
					
					 We will actively contribute to certainly glorifying this significant year marking the 20th anniversary of the President's last signature on a historic document concerning the country's reunification as a year of opening a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity without fail, the letter added.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people of the DPRK are paying high tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Service personnel, people and school youth and children paid homage to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the portraits of smiling President and leader across the country.
					
					 Seen standing before their statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, organs and enterprises at all levels, factories, farms, schools, etc. in Pyongyang and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also laid there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues of the peerlessly great men, recollecting their revolutionary careers and undying feats.
					
					 The statues and portraits at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, Mansudae Art Studio and other places of Pyongyang drew an endless stream of visitors.
					
					 Laid before the statues and portraits were floral baskets in the name of the units of the KPA, organs, enterprises, etc. and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Service personnel, people and school youth and children across the country paid homage to the statues and portraits.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen standing before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also seen standing there was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Laid before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 They entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state and made a bow to him.
					
					 They went round the hall where orders he received are on display and the halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Portraits of Smiling Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Portraits of Smiling Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Chongjin, February 16 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Chinese and Russian consulates general in Chongjin paid tribute to the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province on Sunday, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits and made a bow to them.
					
					 Meanwhile, Chinese residents in Chongjin and foreign guests staying there laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits before paying tribute to them on the same day.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps here, a delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star headed by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, and a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They entered the hall were Kim Jong Il lies in state and made a bow.
					
					 They went round the hall where orders he received are on display and the halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialists National Democratic Front, and its members visited the palace to pay tribute to Kim Jong Il on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Life Dedicated to Country and People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Life Dedicated to Country and People
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the country and the people, making a ceaseless journey of field guidance in his lifetime.
					 He regarded it as his pleasure to work without rest for the country's prosperity and the people's happiness.
					
					 He visited military posts, industrial establishments and farms day and night in all seasons, disregarding weather conditions. His ceaseless field guidance reached every corner of the country.
					
					 It was one day in January Juche 89 (2000) that he was on the way for field guidance to North Phyongan Province.
					
					 On train he made out a detailed schedule for tours of different sectors in the province, saying that work was just a rest for him.
					
					 After the inspection of military units early in the morning, he went round rezoned Handre Plain in Thaechon County for hours. At that time officials could not put up a board of blueprint on land rezoning due to strong wind.
					
					 Then he continued his field guidance, enduring his fatigue.
					
					 Such restless journey of field guidance was based on his patriotic devotion and deep love for the people.
					
					 That is why the DPRK people are missing him so much, saying that their present happiness is attributable to his great pains.

articles.title: Papers Call for Successfully Carrying out Idea and Cause of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Papers Call for Successfully Carrying out Idea and Cause of Kim Jong Il 
						
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Let us successfully carry out the idea and cause of leader Kim Jong Il, closely united around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Newspapers on Sunday say this in editorials on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the eternal image of the great Paektusan nation and banner of all victories and glories, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The history of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary leadership is the sacred history in which he glorified the revolutionary tradition of Mt. Paektu as eternal wealth of the country and nation and the history of his patriotic devotion as he laid an eternal foundation for building the great Paektusan nation with his tireless efforts. 
					
					 It was the steadfast creed of Kim Jong Il that it was necessary to hold fast to the ideological system, revolutionary spirit, revolutionary exploits and experience of struggle, working method and style of President Kim Il Sung as eternal bloodline of the Korean revolution and everlasting foundation for the prosperity of the country. 
					
					 It was Kim Jong Il who paved the way for study tour of Mt. Paektu in his teens and turned its area into a great seat for education in the revolutionary tradition. It was again Kim Jong Il who made sure that the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu was carried forward as the soul of Korea and the roots of the mental power of the Korean people amid the grandiose drive for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism. 
					
					 The Korean people are now making a dynamic advance in the new century of Juche thanks to the powerful politico-military power and material and economic foundation provided by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The grand idea of Kim Jong Il to build the great Paektusan nation is being turned into a brilliant reality under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 We should accomplish the Juche revolutionary cause started in Mt. Paektu true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, as we made a long journey of the revolution under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all to hold in high esteem Kim Jong Il as eternal leader of the Korean revolution and work hard to hasten a final victory of the building a thriving socialist nation and the cause of the Juche-oriented revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK significantly celebrate the Day of the Shining Star (Feb.16), leader Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 Streets in all parts of the DPRK including the capital city of Pyongyang are immersed in a festival atmosphere and the ardent yearning for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 From early in the morning, citizens of different social strata visited the statues and smiling portraits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il across the country.
					
					 The venues of the 18th Kimjongilia Festival and Kimjongilia shows were crowded with visitors.
					
					 Art performances praising Kim Jong Il were given at theatres and other cultural houses throughout the country.
					
					 The 23rd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival and a synchronized swimming demonstration are now going on here to mark the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 Meanwhile, school youth and children and working citizens spent a pleasant time at such recreation centers as Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club and Rungna Dolphinarium. People enjoying recreation facilities were seen in Mangyongdae Amusement Park, Taesongsan Amusement Park and Kaeson Youth Park.
					
					 The Okryu Restaurant and other catering centers served special dishes including noodle in flat vessel, terrapin food and ostrich steak.
					
					 Stalls in streets were serving roast chestnuts, sweet potatoes, wheat cakes stuffed with meat and barley tea to by-passers.
					
					 The DPRK people enjoying the Day of the Shining Star were filled with resolve to advance along the road of the Juche revolution, the Songun (military-first) revolution, under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, true to Kim Jong Il's behests.

articles.title: Mansudae Art Troupe Gives Performance
articles.content:
Mansudae Art Troupe Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Art Troupe gave music and dance performance "Song Devoted to the Sun of Songun" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Sunday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The performance began with female solo and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il". Put on the stage were chorus "Attraction and Reverence", violin ensemble "General Applies Art of Compressing Space", male solo and female pangchang "Tell, O Road of Songun" and other colorful numbers. 
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats Kim Jong Il performed for the party and the revolution, the country and people by leading the Korean revolution and construction along the road of steady victories.
					
					 Unaccompanied chorus "Ode to the Motherland" mesmerized the audience with famous words and sublime and solemn music instilling patriotic enthusiasm into all people. 
					
					 The performance reached its climax when artistes presented female quartet "The Care of Thee Is Best", female sextet "We Cannot Live without Him" and female solo and chorus "Party's Flag, Always together with You."
					
					 They impressively represented the deep trust of all service personnel and people in Marshal Kim Jong Un who is creating new legends about noble love for the people and love for the future.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, meritorious persons and Pyongyangites, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches here and their wives and other foreign guests.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations was held here on Sunday to celebrate the 72nd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were provincial delegates of the KCU, schoolchildren in the city and those pupils expected to join the KCU.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, officials of party organs and the youth league in the city, officials concerned, war veterans and persons of merit.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, said in his report that Kim Jong Il showed profound loving care for the members of the KCU so that they might bring their talents into full bloom, learning to their heart's satisfaction with nothing to desire more in the world.
					
					 The reporter recalled that Marshal Kim Jong Un, carrying forward Kim Jong Il's noble love for the rising generations, showed loving care for the members of the KCU to be always remembered by them.
					
					 He told all KCU members to firmly prepare themselves as reliable reserves for the Songun revolutionary cause remaining true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then there took place an accession ceremony of the KCU at the meeting.
					
					 Led by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, pupils made an oath before joining the KCU. 
					
					 Officials, war veterans and persons of merit put red ties around their necks and pinned badges of the KCU on their chests.
					
					 The new KCU members made their first salute, responding to the slogan "Always Ready for the Socialist Motherland!"
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made by O Ryong Thaek, rector of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Pang Sung Son, principal of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1, and Om Yun Chol, labor hero and people's sportsman.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Mark Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties took place in various parts of the country on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Dancing parties started at the plazas of the Monument to the Party Founding, April 25 House of Culture and Arch of Triumph and other venues in the city amid the playing of the song "We Will Hold Our General in High Esteem".
					
					 Youth and students presented cheerful dances, carrying with ardent longing and profound reverence for Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul for the people till the last moments of his life. 
					
					 They enthusiastically danced to the tunes of the songs including "Our Leader Loved by People", full of pride and happiness of having Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 The dancing parties reached the climax with the playing of songs "Dash toward Future", "Let Us Study", "The Masters of This Land Tell" and "Our Future Is Bright".
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in different parts of the country on the same day.
					
					 Dancing parties clearly reflected the strong will of the youth vanguard of Songun to fully display their wisdom and enthusiasm in the general offensive for achieving a final victory in the building of a thriving nation, united close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held events in Yanji City, Jilin Province, China on February 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 A meeting for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star was held by the association.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and officials of the association, representatives of the affiliated organizations, compatriots in China, the DPRK consul general in Shenyang and Chinese personages.
					
					 Choe Un Bok in her report praised the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il as the one of the great Songun brilliant commander and the great father.
					
					 The benevolent image of Kim Jong Il who led compatriots living in an alien land to invariably take the road of patriotism, not forgetting them even a moment, is always cherished in the hearts of all Koreans in China, she said.
					
					 The Songun politics, politics of loving the people pursued by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is identical to President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is exciting the whole nation and the world and indicating the bright future of Songun Korea which will prosper, she noted.
					
					 She vowed to more firmly build the General Association of Koreans in China into the overseas compatriots organization of Juche. She expressed the will to make positive contributions to achieving the great unity of the nation this year.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants watched a Korean film documenting the Songun revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then followed an art performance, photo and book exhibition and reception for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 There took place meetings, photo and book exhibitions and lectures of Koreans in China in Beijing and Shenyang on Feb. 10 and 11.

articles.title: Meeting of Koreans in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Meeting of Koreans in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Tokyo, February 15 (KNS-KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of Koreans in Japan at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Saturday to mark the 72nd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of the Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other officials of Chongryon, compatriots, teaching staff and students of Korea University.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his report said Kim Jong Il, who was born as the son of guerillas in the crucible of the anti-Japanese war and grew up to be a great revolutionary, carried out the cause of world-historic significance unprecedented in human history while steering the Juche-oriented cause.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism, proclaimed the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism, strengthened the party, state and army into invincible ranks with his superb leadership art, thus putting the dignity of Juche Korea on the highest level and demonstrating its might before the world, he noted, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader who wisely led Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan and the boundlessly benevolent father who provided the happiness of Koreans in Japan and ensured the rosy future of the rising generations with his warmest love for them.
					
					 He called on all the Koreans in Japan to thoroughly implement the behests of Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and thus fully demonstrate the honor of being a model of the overseas compatriots movement in the world. 
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was read out there.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Tokyo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Tokyo
 Tokyo, February 15 (KNS-KCNA) -- An art performance was given at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Saturday to celebrate the 72nd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Nam Sung U, Pae Ik Ju and Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairmen of the committee, Pae Jin Gu, vice-chairman and concurrently director general of the General Affairs Department of the same committee, advisors and directors of the committee, head of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, senior officials of the central organizations and enterprises, chairpersons of the headquarters and officials of Chongryon in Kanto, compatriots, teaching staff and students of Korea University.
					
					 It began with chorus "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and "Ode to Comrade Kim Jong Il", immortal revolutionary songs.
					
					 Whenever photo of smiling Kim Jong Il and venerable images of him taking warm care of Koreans in Japan were projected on the background, the audience was moved to tears.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as solo "I Wish to Go" and group singing "We Will Follow You Single-mindedly" and "Ode to the Motherland" and others.
					
					 Performers impressively represented the firm will of Koreans in Japan to deeply trust and remain intensely loyal only to supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying out the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The repertoire included such colorful numbers as comic story "Let Us Keep Beautiful Flowers in Full Bloom", chorus "Let Us Spruce up Our Village of Youths" and others. They made truthful artistic representation of the will of the Koreans in Japan to exalt the honor of being proud overseas citizens of the DPRK.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Held by Chongryon
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Held by Chongryon
 Tokyo, February 15 (KNS-KCNA) -- A photo exhibition of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Saturday to celebrate the 72nd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed in the front of the venue of the exhibition was a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were photos showing Kim Jong Il taking warm care of the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and pictures documenting immortal revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the visitors were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Nam Sung U, Pae Ik Ju and Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairmen of the committee, Pae Jin Gu, vice-chairman and concurrently director general of the General Affairs Department of the same committee, advisors and directors of the committee, head of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, senior officials of the organizations and enterprises, chairpersons of the headquarters of Chongryon in Kanto.
					
					 Meantime, a seminar was held by the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan at the Korean Press Hall in Tokyo on Friday to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Tajikistan, DR Congo and Guinea on February 7 and 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 40th anniversary of his proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 On display at the venues of the lectures were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were pictures introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Kurbonzyon Mirzoyeva, member of the Presidium of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il strengthened the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into the invincible party in which the whole party has achieved unity and cohesion on the basis of the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung, the Juche idea, and into the ever-victorious combat rank.
					
					 After proclaiming the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme of the WPK, he clearly indicated the detailed orientation and ways for carrying out it.
					
					 Under his veteran and seasoned leadership the WPK has been further strengthened into the revolutionary party centered on Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Nzemba Yangana, chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in DR Congo, praised Kim Jong Il as the greatest man who led the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence to victory with his distinguished leadership ability.
					
					 Secouna Camara, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, lauded Kim Jong Il for devoting himself to the country and people.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the lecture in Guinea.

articles.title: Principled Stand of DPRK Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Principled Stand of DPRK Supported by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on February 6 in support of the statement of the spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The statement expressed deep concern over the grave situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities.
					
					 It said:
					
					 There is a tendency towards detente, reconciliation and reunification on the Korean peninsula thanks to the patriotic will of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 However, the U.S. and south Korean authorities are scheming to disturb it.
					
					 We vehemently denounce all provocations of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities against the DPRK, the motherland of Juche.
					
					 We also resolutely reject the assertion of the imperialist media patronizing that such racket for a war of aggression is "annual".
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's principled stand clarified in the statement of the spokesman for the Policy Department of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 We demand the U.S. and south Korean authorities roll back their scenarios for war drills against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Indonesian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Indonesian Political Party
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle issued a statement on February 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK instituted the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il as the Day of the Shining Star in reflection of the unanimous desire of all party members and other people to hold him in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 He turned the WPK into the party with a strong sense of organization and discipline, the Korean People's Army into the invincible armed forces and the DPRK into the power no one dares provoke.
					
					 His life is the noble one of a peerless patriot and distinguished leader who dedicated his all to the victory of the socialist cause and the human cause of independence.
					
					 His august name and immortal exploits will always be cherished in the minds of not only the Korean people but also the progressive humankind.
					
					 We deem it an honor to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star together with the Korean people.
					
					 We are convinced that the WPK and the Korean people will register bigger success in the drive for strengthening the party and building a thriving nation this year under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Personages of Kuwait, Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Personages of Kuwait, Myanmar
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Personages of Kuwait and Myanmar issued statements on February 4 and 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Yousfe Al Amiri, president of the Kuwait House of Works who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, said that he recollected with deep emotion the life of Kim Jong Il, longing for him, on February 16 every year. He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il assumed the responsibility for the Korean revolution in the hardest period and resolutely smashed the imperialist allied forces' moves to collapse the DPRK.
					
					 Socialist Korea turned into a political and military power and impregnable fortress thanks to his iron-will, gifted military strategy and far-sightedness.
					
					 The Songun politics of the DPRK is successfully being carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK's political and military might has been further strengthened and great successes made in the struggle for building a thriving nation thanks to his extraordinary political ability, matchless pluck and policy of loving the people.
					
					 We believe that the north-south relations would be improved and peace and security on the Korean peninsula firmly ensured under his wise leadership.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, praised Kim Jong Il as the people's leader who performed immortal exploits in the struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Celebrate Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met in Wonsan Port and Haeju Port Saturday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 They placed bouquets and paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il in Wonsan City and Haeju City.
					
					 Attending the meetings were captains and crewmen of the Panamanian-flagged ship Sea Star 7 and Belizean-flagged ship Hai Xing 2.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il is the eternal leader of the Korean people, symbol of the great Paektusan nation and the banner of all victories and glory as he brightly indicated the path to be taken by the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence with his outstanding wisdom and energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 Grand monumental edifices built in different parts of the DPRK are a great fruition of the firm determination and will of Kim Jong Il to give a face-lift to the appearance of the country and glorify Kim Il Sung's Korea all over the world, they said.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il is being creditably carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, they stressed, adding:
					
					 The Korean people are upholding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and are waging dynamic struggle to build a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK will surely build a reunified, prosperous and powerful country in the near future as there is the wise guidance of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un and the single-minded unity of the army and people upholding the party's leadership with loyalty.
					
					 Letters to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of February 16 Art Education Publishing House Observed
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of February 16 Art Education Publishing House Observed
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The February 16 Art Education Publishing House marked its 40th anniversary Saturday.
					 The publishing house is a comprehensive base for publishing art education books to widely introduce the leadership exploits performed by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu in the development of Juche-oriented arts and produce books for art education.
					
					 It has published books on the greatness of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, textbooks and reference books of at least 3 000 varieties in the past period, making contributions to the training of art talents. 
					
					 They include books including "Complete collection of Korean folk music", art education textbooks such as collection of music for accompanying songs "Our leader", "Eternal Image", wind music collection "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives" and reference books.
					
					 It also published textbooks on music principle subjects including "Theory of Music Essentials" and "Vocalization Science" and "Theory of Korean Painting Method".
					
					 It published more than 50 varieties of electronic publications and various kinds of school, exercise music and works including "Children's piano learning" and "Photographing depiction technique" as required by the IT age to help improve the quality of art education.
					
					 It sent service personnel collections of songs and music representing the spirit of the era, helping them serve in the army full of revolutionary emotion and optimism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Poem Posted on Websites of Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Poem Posted on Websites of Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- "Shining Star", poem written by President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 50th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was respectively posted on the websites of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Feb. 4.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted on Websites of British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted on Websites of British Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The full text of the letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the participants in the national conference of subworkteam leaders in the agricultural sector "Let Us Bring About Innovations in Agricultural Production under the Unfurled Banner of the Socialist Rural Theses" was posted by the British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche idea on their websites on February 10.
					 The work, made public on Feb. 6, Juche 103 (2014), deals with the sea changes brought about in the socialist rural construction of the DPRK since the publication of the socialist rural theses (Feb. 25, 1964) and indicates tasks and ways to finally settle the rural question.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del 16 de febrero
						
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 16 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan donde rindio sublime homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Ryom Chol Song y otros comandantes del EPC.
					
					El Mariscal entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					A ambos lados de ellas estaban instaladas las banderas del partido, la Republica y el ejercito y estaba de pie la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y el Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino.
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor dio el parte de recepcion hacia los Generalisimos.
					
					Fueron colocados ante las estatuas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro en nombre del EPC.
					
					El Mariscal junto con los participantes rindio sublime homenaje a los Generalisimos ante las estatuas y al Dirigente en el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado su cuerpo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un otorga titulos militares a comandantes del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un otorga titulos militares a comandantes del EPC
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dio el dia 15 una orden de otorgar titulos militares a los comandantes del EPC.
					Segun la orden, el titulo de coronel general corresponde a Kim Rak Gyom, el de teniente general, a Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Yong Rae, U Chol, Kang Ri Won, Choe Sin Uk, Ri Kum Hyong, Pak Chun Bong y Rim Kwang Ung y el de mayor general, a Song Hak Chol, Ku Kwang So, Ko Un Bong, Kim Chol Ho, Choe Tu Yong, Jong To Ho, Jang Pyong Hyon, Pak Il, Ju Song Nam, Ri Yong Gon, Ri Wan Sik, Kim Kwang Il, Kim Tok Ho, Kil Ryong Ho, Han Kwang Chol, Kim Jong Bong, Pae Un Chol, Kim Sun Gil, Ju Hang Gon, Kim Jae Yun, Kim Chol Su, Ri Su Il, Jong Ui Son, Pak Song Chan, Kim Si Bok, Ri Ho Yong, Kim Tong Chol, Kim Ui Jun y Hwang Sam Chon.
					
					En la orden, el Mariscal expreso una confianza de que bien conscientes de la confianza y esperanza del partido y el pueblo, los comandantes del EPC, descendientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung, soldados y discipulos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, cumpliran con su responsabilidad y mision en la sagrada lucha por la victoria definitiva de la revolucion del Juche.

articles.title: Efectuada demostracion de natacion sincronica por Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Efectuada demostracion de natacion sincronica por Dia de Estrella Luz
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en la piscina del Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Changgwang la demostracion de natacion sincronica "Que brille la causa de Paektu", dedicada al dia del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					La vieron Kim Ki Nam, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las organizaciones de masas y los ministerios, trabajadores de esta capital, las delegaciones de compatriotas en ultramar, los coreanos en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y de los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Se presentaron varias piezas tituladas "Pensando en el General", "El General es el hijo de la guerrilla", "Cancion de amor por el pueblo", etc.
					
					En sus movimientos elegantes y formaciones en constante cambio, las ejecutantes describieron la infinita veneracion al Dirigente quien hasta el ultimo momento de su vida, realizo la Marcha forzada de orientaciones en el terreno con su voluntad de acero y esfuerzos sobrehumanos.
					
					En los programas "Siempre con la bandera del partido" y "Nuestro Sol amable" hicieron conocer la felicidad y el orgullo del pueblo coreano, que cuenta con los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, y su elevado entusiasmo revolucionario con que adelanta el futuro maravilloso de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il bajo la guia del Partido.
					
					La demostracion manifesto la determinacion del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos de adelantar la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, uniendose compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
